batches.description: Drizzle inserts - payables, receivables, tax-credits, fleet/documents(2x), fleet/tires
batches.pattern: typeof table.$inferInsert + string conversion for schema fields

batches.description: Drizzle inserts - products, tms/occurrences, tms/pickup-orders, tms/trips/checkpoint, wms/movements(2x)
Drizzle inserts + missing fields + type conversions - btg-dda-service, cte-processor, wms/movements
batches.pattern: typeof table.$inferInsert + add missing required fields + number→string for decimal

batches.description: Agent Review critical bugs - branchId hardcoded, as any usage, decimal toString()
batches.pattern: Multi-tenancy compliance + eliminate as any + String() for decimals
Let TypeScript infer AG Grid types + schema compliance warnings

batches.description: Components + Validators - AG Grid ColDef, cellStyle, Zod Resolver, Framer Motion, PDFKit
batches.pattern: Type assertions + remove invalid props + ColDef typing

batches.description: GradientText props not forwarded to motion.span
batches.pattern: Filter conflicting props before spread in motion elements

batches.summary: Jornada completa de ~1200 erros para 0 erros através de 5 épicos sistemáticos

patterns_learned.description: Criar variável tipada antes do insert para evitar overload mismatch
patterns_learned.code:
const insertData: typeof table.$inferInsert = { ...fields };
await db.insert(table).values(insertData);
patterns_learned.when_to_use: Sempre que inserir dados via Drizzle com dialect mssql

patterns_learned.description: Decimal columns em MSSQL são representados como string no $inferInsert
patterns_learned.when_to_use: Quando schema define decimal(x,y) mas código usa number

patterns_learned.description: SEMPRE validar que recursos multi-tenant existem antes de usar
patterns_learned.code:
if (!resource) throw new Error('Resource not found');
const value = resource.field;
patterns_learned.when_to_use: Qualquer código que acesse organizationId ou branchId de recursos

patterns_learned.description: Tipar columnDefs com ColDef<RowType>[] ou usar type assertion
patterns_learned.when_to_use: Definições de colunas AG Grid para evitar inference errors

patterns_learned.description: Zod resolver requer type assertion para compatibilidade
patterns_learned.when_to_use: useForm com zodResolver quando houver type mismatch

patterns_learned.description: Filtrar props conflitantes antes de spread em motion elements
patterns_learned.code:
const { style: _style, ...htmlProps } = props;
<motion.div {...(htmlProps as unknown as Record<string, unknown>)} />
patterns_learned.when_to_use: Componentes que aceitam props e usam motion elements

patterns_learned.description: Zod enum sem as const nem errorMap quando não necessário
patterns_learned.when_to_use: Validação simples de enum sem mensagens customizadas

patterns_learned.description: NUNCA use as any - criar interfaces tipadas específicas
patterns_learned.code:
interface TypedBody { field: Type; }
const typed = body as unknown as TypedBody;
patterns_learned.when_to_use: SEMPRE - as any é proibido no projeto
